'''Yasumoto's Last Notes''' ''(unofficial name)'' is a [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] that takes place in [[Fort Fujitou]], [[Yashiori Island]]. It requires the completion of the [[World Quest]] "[[Treatment on the Island]]" and is time gated over 4 in real life days (3 server resets).

==Steps==
# Put {{Item|Naku Weed|x=12|25}} in the basket in front of Yasumoto's house once a day for 3 days
#* An [[Exquisite Chest]] will appear the following day the first 2 times this is done

==Notes==
* Completing this Hidden Exploration Objective awards the ''[[Wonders of the World]]'' achievement "[[A Doctor's Odyssey]]."
* The basket next to Yasumoto's treasure will not disappear from its location even after obtaining the treasure.
